pullrequest.title: Added parsing of pose information to DOM

content.raw:
Out of curiosity, are you running some tool when you make these header changes? There are number of instances where the changes seem incorrect. For example, you have added `<string>` to `Collision.cc` when `<string>` is already include in `Collision.hh`.

Looking at it more closely, it seems that you're advocating to duplicate all includes from header files in source files. Is there a reason for this?
content.html:
Out of curiosity, are you running some tool when you make these header changes? There are number of instances where the changes seem incorrect. For example, you have added <string> to Collision.cc when <string> is already include in Collision.hh.

Looking at it more closely, it seems that you're advocating to duplicate all includes from header files in source files. Is there a reason for this?
